question: How can I secure my home network against cyber threats, and can you generate an image of a secure home network setup?

steps.content: How can I secure my home network against cyber threats, and can you generate an image of a secure home network setup?
Plan: 1) Search for best practices to secure a home network. 2) Generate an image of a secure home network setup. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for best practices to secure a home network against cyber threats.

To secure your home network: 1) Change default router passwords. 2) Enable WPA3 encryption. 3) Use a strong, unique Wi-Fi password. 4) Keep firmware updated. 5) Disable WPS. 6) Use a guest network for visitors.
Generating an image of a secure home network setup.
Image of a secure home network setup generated.
Can you also tell me how to monitor my network for unusual activity?
Plan: 1) Search for methods to monitor a home network for unusual activity. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for methods to monitor a home network for unusual activity.
To monitor your network: 1) Use network monitoring software. 2) Check router logs regularly. 3) Set up alerts for unusual activity. 4) Use a firewall to block suspicious traffic.
